exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="btnExplainSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="280" height="260"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btnExplain_down_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btnExplain_up_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnPracticeSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="280" height="260"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btnPractice_down_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btnPractice_up_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnQuizzesSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="280" height="260"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btnQuizzes_down_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btnQuizzes_up_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnBackbomepageSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="7_2_png" includeIn="down" x="-2" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="7_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnChangeSceneSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="50" height="50"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="50" height.up="50">
	<e:Image source="btnChangeScene_down_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btnChangeScene_up_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnCloseSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="14" height="14"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btn_close_up_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnPartsSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btn_3_2_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btn_3_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnRestartSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="6_2_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="6_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnStandardSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btn_2_2_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btn_2_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnToolsSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btn_4_2_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btn_4_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BtnTrainRecordsSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="111" height="38"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btn_1_2_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="btn_1_1_png" includeIn="up" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CPoint_1_2Skin" width="35" height="35" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="cpoint_1_2_png" x="0" y="0" name="cPoint_1_2" id="cPoint_1_2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CPoint_2_2Skin" width="37" height="37" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="cpoint_2_2_png" x="0" y="0" name="cPoint_2_2" id="cPoint_2_2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainUISkin" width="1124" height="768" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_1_png" x="-22" y="134"/>
	<e:Button id="btnExplain" label="按钮" x="14" skinName="btnExplainSkin" verticalCenter="60"/>
	<e:Button id="btnPractice" label="按钮" x="400" skinName="BtnPracticeSkin" verticalCenter="60"/>
	<e:Button id="btnQuizzes" label="按钮" x="791" skinName="BtnQuizzesSkin" verticalCenter="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PartsPanelSkin" width="400" height="310" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="parts_panel_bg_png" x="0" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_close" label="按钮" x="373" y="16" skinName="BtnCloseSkin" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="partBtn_1" source="partBtn_1_png" x="33" y="48" name="partBtn_1" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="partBtn_2" source="partBtn_2_png" x="149" y="48" name="partBtn_2" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Part_1Skin" states="up,down,disabled" width="49" height="42"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="part_1_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Part_2Skin" width="50" height="35" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="part_2_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Tool_1Skin" width="44" height="41" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="tool_1_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Tool_2Skin" width="47" height="45" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="tool_2_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PartsPanelSkin" width="1124" height="553" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="bg_0_png" y="0" x="0" name="part_2" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="bg_2_png" x="10" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_trainRecords" y="2" label="按钮" skinName="BtnTrainRecordsSkin" x="1010"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_standard" y="58" label="按钮" skinName="BtnStandardSkin" x="1010"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_parts" y="114" label="按钮" skinName="BtnPartsSkin" x="1010"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_tools" y="170" label="按钮" skinName="BtnToolsSkin" x="1010"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_restart" y="455" label="按钮" skinName="BtnRestartSkin" x="1010"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_backHomrpage" y="511" label="按钮" skinName="BtnBackbomepageSkin" horizontalCenter="503.5"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_nextScene" label="按钮" x="933" y="235" skinName="BtnChangeSceneSkin"/>
	<e:Image id="desktopToolkit" source="lingjianggonju_png" y="305" x="1007" name="desktopToolkit"/>
	<ns1:Drag id="part_1" x="1013" y="311" skinName="Part_1Skin" name="part_1"/>
	<ns1:Drag id="part_2" x="1061" y="313" skinName="Part_2Skin" name="part_2"/>
	<ns1:Drag id="tool_1" x="1015" y="354" skinName="Tool_1Skin" name="tool_1"/>
	<ns1:Drag id="tool_2" x="1057" y="349" skinName="Tool_2Skin" name="tool_2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RecordsPanelSkin" width="380" height="310" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="records_panel_bg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_close" y="16" label="按钮" skinName="BtnCloseSkin" x="355"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_info" x="10" y="42" height="255" width="359" textColor="0x010000" size="15" name="txt_info" fontFamily="Adobe 仿宋 Std R"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StandardPanelSkin" width="380" height="310" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="standard_panel_bg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_close" y="16" label="按钮" skinName="BtnCloseSkin" x="354"/>
	<e:Label y="42" textColor="0x010000" height="255" fontFamily="Adobe 仿宋 Std R" id="txt_info" width="359" size="15" name="txt_info" x="11" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="top"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ToolsPanelSkin" width="481" height="260" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="tools_panel_bg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Button x="454" label="按钮" y="17" skinName="BtnCloseSkin" id="btn_close"/>
	<e:Image id="toolBtn_1" source="toolBtn_1_png" x="32" y="143" name="toolBtn_1"/>
	<e:Image id="toolBtn_2" source="toolBtn_2_png" x="140" y="141" name="toolBtn_2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Scene2ViewSkin" width="998" height="553" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="bg_1" source="bg_white_2_png" y="0" x="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="cPoint_1_1" source="cpoint_1_1_png" x="241" y="415" name="cPoint_1_1" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="cPoint_2_1" source="cpoint_2_1_png" x="696" y="420" name="cPoint_2_1" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="partBtn_1" source="part_1_png" x="238" y="413" name="partBtn_1" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="partBtn_2" source="part_2_png" x="692" y="424" name="partBtn_2" visible="false"/>
	<ns1:CheckPoint id="cPoint_1_2" x="245" y="419" skinName="CPoint_1_2Skin" name="cPoint_1_2"/>
	<ns1:CheckPoint id="cPoint_2_2" x="695" y="421" skinName="CPoint_2_2Skin" name="cPoint_2_2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TsssSkin" width="200" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
